summary: REQ-14 is largely implemented: the CalendarView h2 now renders a primary heading line with a smaller, muted one-sentence English description beneath it. However, the diff summary indicates changes beyond the selected h2 element, which conflicts with the constraint/AC that only the selected h2 be modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Only the selected h2 element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1] is modified; no other layout/elements are changed in this build.
missing_requirements.reason: The CalendarView.tsx diff summary shows additional non-h2-related logic/commentary (e.g., expanded 'hasSavedContent' checks) implying modifications outside the selected h2 element, violating the 'ONLY to the selected element' constraint/AC.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/explicit 'hasSavedContent' logic to treat measurements/body fat/workouts as saved content (not just images), with detailed commentary.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add a short description under the CalendarView heading within the selected h2; it did not request changes to calendar day marker logic or saved-content detection.
